other_tests.changes_over_time: First CSF obtained on day 1 had positive results for BoDV-1 RNA (515-1,850 copies/mL) while CSF obtained on day 4 tested negative.
BoDV-1-specific antibodies were not detected in serum or CSF samples obtained earlier.

other_tests.findings: Normal cell count (2 leucocytes/μL), lactate 1.98 mmol/L, protein 925 mg/L.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CSF analysis on day 8 showed a leucocyte count of 41 μL.

other_tests.procedure_name: Western blot using recombinant BoDV-1 proteins
ELISA tests using recombinant BoDV-1 proteins
other_tests.findings: Indicated reactivity against BoDV-1 X protein, with anti-BoDV-1-P-IgG just above cutoff in the last plasma sample, and anti-BoDV-1-N-IgG not detectable.
